snippet.title: 'Cash me ousside' teen Danielle Bregoli sentenced to five years probation
snippet.content:
"Cash Me Outside" Girl Danielle Bregoli's Dad Says NO MORE Child Support -JS 5:50
Danielle Bregoli aka the 'Cash Me Outside' girl has been making a lot of money off of her bad behavior. So much so, that her dad feels like she can support herself now that she's a celebrity(?), and doesn't think that child support payments are necessary any longer. What do you think? Should he be let off the hook? Tell us your thoughts in the comments below.
July 20th 2017 13 days ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
She's out. Danielle 'Cash me ousside' Bregoli appeared at a Florida court for sentencing on after pleading guilty to four criminal charges. Picture: Splash
Staff writerNews Corp Australia Network
Share
SHE went viral for her foul-mouthed appearance on Dr Phil. Now Danielle Bregoli - aka the 'cash me ousside' teen - has faced court on a string of charges. The 15-year-old was today sentenced to five years probation after pleading guilty to grand theft, weed possession and filing a false police report in a Florida court. is reporting that Bregoli faced the charges from incidents prior to her appearance on Dr Phil, which went viral last year. But she's not entirely out of trouble - she could still face charges for "battery" after another incident in Florida, the gossip site reports.
Danielle Bregoli appeared at a Florida court, where she was sentenced to five years probation for offences she committed before her meteoric rise to fame. Picture: SplashSource:Splash News Australia Then aged 14, the troubled teen rose to internet fame in 2016 when she appeared on an episode of Dr Phil, threatening audience members with the words "cash me ousside, how bow dah" (aka "catch me outside, how about that"). She appearaed at a hearing at South County Courthouse, in Delray Beach, to hear her punishment for offences she committed before her meteoric rise to fame. She admitted grand theft, grand theft auto, possession of marijuana and filing a false report in a hearing in June. The notoriously wayward teen, who is now based in Los Angeles, has been filming her own reality TV show.

sindex.name: Girl Danielle Bregoli's Dad Says NO MORE Child Support
